author: AddictedToStyrene
title: A lot of green bushes and nothing else
review: This supplementary set from 2001 contains nothing more than 25 of the green spiky bush. It's good for desert or scrub scenery, such as for a Western scene, or crazy hairstyles for Legoland scale figures. Note that these are one-piece mouldings. This set does not contain the Bush Base piece that can be used to make the bushes bigger.
